title: 3: S2E03 – “Layers of Deceit” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales by Jeff Hartin, Sasha Brokov, Jack London, and an anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about mysteries on the seas, unusual abductions, dangers in the depths, and elixirs of immortality. You’re listening to the standard edition of tonight’s program, which includes the first two stories. If you’d like to show your support and enjoy an extended version of this and or other episodes, with twice the terror, visit SimplyScaryPodcast.com and click “Patrons” in the upper menu to sign up today. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e03
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
